price: 30. Ee isaga jeeso oo sug10, iyaguna (gaalada) waxay sugayaan (waxaad ku dambeysaan).
footnotes: 10. Nabi Muxmmad s.c.w. iyo mu’miniinta waxaa la amray inay ka sugaan guul xagga Alle iyo halaagga gaalada dulmiga badan gooray ahaataba.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.
